stations

Class StationsPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • stations.StationsPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StationsContract.UserActionsListener

    public class StationsPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements StationsContract.UserActionsListener
    Listen to user actions from the UI. Retrieve data and update the UI.
    Author:
    michael
